About me

Hey, I’m Sebastian, I’m a Software Engineer at Envoy.

I like writting about software. I really hope you find my posts helpful.

Please feel free to reach out to me if there’s anything you feel I can help with or in case there’s something that can be improved in any of the posts.

Side Projects

Working on side projects is a great way to learn, I totally encourage you to get something out there, for real or for fun, I guarantee you won’t regret it. Here are my side projects:

  • Frozonic: Frozonic is a project for managing code freezing periods on Github repos. The idea is to be able to communicate when a code freeze is active so that teams are aware.

Consulting

I’m currently open to consulting. I have experience on Ruby on Rails, Backend applications, API development and integrations. Please reach out to me at sebasjimenezv@gmail.com.
